title: Fundamentals of Applied Optics: Practical Projects Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course for current practitioners to improve applied optics skills, emphasizing collaborative activities that simulate real R&D projects using constructivist pedagogy.

learning_goals: Learners can apply optical theories (e.g., refraction, interference, diffraction) to practical cases
Learners can collaborate with peers to solve optical design problems using LMS-based collaborative tools.
Learners can analyze experimental data and write reports by incorporating formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
